description: A trinomial made into a single variable polynomial coefficient triangle form three Pascallike factorial binomials in {x,y},{y,z} and {x,z}: binomials as: g(n,m)= If[m < "is less than" Floor[n/2], m!, (n - m)! ]; f(x,y,n)=Sum[g(n, i)*x^i*y^(n - i), {i, 0, n}]; p(x,y,z,n)=f(x,y,n)+f(y,z,n)+f(x,z,n).
